channel.title: Comments on: Map of Web2Ireland Companies

item.title: By: YannR
item.dc:creator: YannR
item.description:
The Mapeed team has developed CrunchVision as a mashup of the CrunchBase database (via APIs) + Google Maps + plugin Mapeed
Feel free to use it for the promotion of the high dynamism of Irish startups (just compare with nearby countries) !
Just a note : CrunchVision is not edited by CrunchBase but directly by Mapeed :-)
Yann Mapeed
item.content:encoded:
The Mapeed team has developed CrunchVision as a mashup of the CrunchBase database (via APIs) + Google Maps + plugin Mapeed

Feel free to use it for the promotion of the high dynamism of Irish startups (just compare with nearby countries) !

Just a note : CrunchVision is not edited by CrunchBase but directly by Mapeed

Yann
Mapeed
